1) Male and female graduate enrollment (1967 - 2015). Compare trends in total graduate enroll- ment for males and females (including full-time/part-time and private/public universities) in the United States from 1967 - 2015. Describe your results statistically, graphically and in text.
```{r}

male_female_linegraph<- ggplot(grad_enroll, aes(Year)) +
  geom_line(aes(y=Total_Males, colour="Total_Males"))+
  geom_line(aes(y=Total_Females, colour="Total_Females"))+
   scale_x_continuous(expand=c(0,0), limits = c(1967,2015))+
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0), limits=c(250,000,2,000,000), breaks=c(250,000,300,000,350,000,400,000,450,000,500,000,550,000,600,000,650,000,700,000,750,000,800,000,850,000,900,000,950,000,1,000,000,1,500,000,2,000,000)) +
  ggtitle("Total Females Enrolled 1967-2015") +
  ylab("Total Enrollment of Females and Males 1967-2015")
  theme_classic()



female_linegraph



  


```
